name: S
description: Token S is a deflationary utility token, created by crypto influencer Snehur, integrated into a dynamic ecosystem designed to reduce supply through constant burns. The token operates on a mechanism where 1% of each transaction is permanently destroyed, promoting scarcity. S is the native utility token used for: - Fees for internal gaming activities and all transactions. - Purchasing products and services within the ecosystem using S. - Access to purchase other tokens that can only be bought with S. - Accelerating the burn rate through frequent ecosystem interactions.
